byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Dr W L Phelps assails student Eur war isolation petition
snippet: NEW HAVEN, Conn., May 31-- The United States will have such splendid isolation if Hitler wins, according to Professor William Lyon Phelps of Yale University, that it would be friendless among the world's nations. A statement to The Yale Daily News...

headline.main: DR. PHELPS DEPLORES YALE PEACE PETITION; Asks 1,400 Signers About Isolation if Hitler Wins

lead_paragraph: NEW HAVEN, Conn., May 31-- The United States will have such splendid isolation if Hitler wins, according to Professor William Lyon Phelps of Yale University, that it would be friendless among the world's nations. A statement to The Yale Daily News referred to...
